message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'll take the lion's share, but you get a decent chunk to start with.
Alice, let's be realistic. I'm feeling generous today, so how about a 60/40 split in my favor? This offer won't last forever.
Bob, you're being greedy. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not giving you more than 45%.  If you keep rejecting my offers, you'll only have yourself to blame.
Alice, it's clear we both want a larger piece of the pie. I'm proposing a 58/42 split. Consider this my final offer - the clock is ticking, and neither of us benefits from waiting any longer.
